text: Bernoy-le-Château is a commune. It is in Hauts-de-France in the Aisne department in north France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2023 and consists of the former communes of Berzy-le-Sec and Noyant-et-Aconin (the seat). == References == Category:2023 establishments in France Category:Communes in Aisne
title: Bernoy-le-Château
